attributes.additional_details: I know that my child would be more upset,not being treated and being laughed at,at school, rather than being treated and having the issue dissolved which stops it from spreading. I spend hundreds of pounds treating my children each year, so how is that fair.
attributes.background: I understand why the nit nurse is no longer available due to singling children out and right of choice. where is my  right of choice, as I get nits every time my child comes home from school with them.
